properties.name: app.jwt.ttl-minutes
properties.description: TTL in minutes for JWT tokens

properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for signing JWT tokens

properties.name: app.cache.ttl-minutes
properties.description: TTL in minutes for API caching

properties.name: app.async.max-worker
properties.description: Maximum number of threads the pool is allowed to create.

properties.name: app.async.max-queue
properties.description: Maximum number of tasks that can be queued. More than this will be rejected (TaskRejectedException/RejectedExecutionException)

properties.name: upload.profile-pic.max-size
properties.description: Maximum file size for profile pictures
